programme.desc: Harvey Endings Part 1 / Harvey Endings Part 2 - Just as Richie reaches the end of his Childhood Immersion Checklist, the Harvey Street kids find out Lotta's leaving ... forever!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Rupert Saves Christmas - While riding his sleigh in the sky towards the North Pole on Christmas Eve, Crinkle the snow elf falls & lands in Nutwood. Worried about the fact Santa won't be able to deliver any presents without him Rupert & friends help Crinkle attract Santa's attention in the sky by building a huge magical daisy chain. It begins to fall apart as Crinkle climbs up high and so the gang decorate a magical Christmas tree that can be seen from the sky. As they hear santa's sleigh approaching crinkle climbs the tree & is reunites with Santa ensuring all presents are delivered on Christmas day.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Rupert And The Snow Key - Jack Frost has misplaced his Snow Key which unlocks the Spring. Without the key it will be snowy & Winter in Nutwood forever. Rupert & friends search Nutwood to help find the key unknowing Raggety has found the special key & is keeping it very safe. Will the gang find it in time & unlock Spring in time for the flowers & plants in Nutwood?

programme.title: My Life Me Ep51
programme.desc: Fish Fiasco - Competition gets in the way of raising awareness for an endangered species when Birch and Sandra take up the exact same cause. What starts out as a campaign to help the environment turns into a full-blown fish fiasco as the two girls refuse to cooperate.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep52
programme.desc: Birch'S Trial - Circumstantial evidence puts Birch in the hot seat. A caricature of a less popular student is discovered and all eyes turn to resident Manganaki Birch Small. Soon court is in session and Birch is making her case before a jury of her peers. But proving her innocence isn't enough; Birch wants to know who's behind the pen.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep103
programme.desc: Grubby Ahoy - Grubby has got stuck on Aunt Tulip's boat. Can anybody save him before he floats away?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep104
programme.desc: Stingo Has Visitors - Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Dennis And The Beanostalk: Part 1 - A massive Beanostalk transports all the Gang’s Christmas Stuff – and Gnasher – beyond the clouds to a Land of Giants! Dennis and the Gang bravely climb up to Ginormotown, determined to find Gnasher and bring Christmas back. On their quest they end up giving away all their christmas goodies, showing the Ginormotowners – and themselves what Christmas is really about!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Dennis And The Beanostalk: Part 2 - A massive Beanostalk transports all the Gang’s Christmas Stuff – and Gnasher – beyond the clouds to a Land of Giants! On their quest they end up giving away all their christmas goodies, showing the Ginormotowners – and themselves what Christmas is really about!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Spring is Here! - It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep996
programme.desc: Ready, Race, Rescue - It's the Adventure Bay 500! The pups are ready to be the pit crew for their race hero, The Whoosh! When the legendary racer is unable to drive in the championship race, he calls on Marshall to take the wheel and race in his place!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Switcheroo / Protect The Egg - Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fundraising Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep617
programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park.

programme.desc: The Kingdom of Sleepwell! - All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Weekend - At the weekend, Bluey and Bingo are playing in the garden with Dad. But Bingo gets upset when she discovers a walking leaf insect and Dad doesn't notice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep48
programme.desc: The Tour Guide Badge - Gerbie the snake is on holiday and would like to see all the beautiful sights. Duggee can help, he does have his Tour Guide badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep49
programme.desc: The Sailing Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they encounter the Penguins who explain they were on a very important mission when they got sick.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep50
programme.desc: The Key Badge - Roly is digging in the garden when his spade suddenly hits something. It's a key. But what does it do? Duggee has his key badge, they can find out through trial and error.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep30
programme.desc: Pan-American Highway, Panama - The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Long and Short - Kit and Pup are cycling. Can you see who is riding the long bike and who is riding the short bike? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators measure their footprints.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep6
programme.desc: Dragon - Dee encourages a friend to say 'dragon' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of dragons!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep84
programme.desc: Musical Statues - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po enjoy a game of musical statues. It takes the Teletubbies a few turns to work out what to do when the music stops; they must stand very still.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep23
programme.desc: Hello - Small catches a space probe while fishing. Major says it is a useless thing but Mother thinks the probe might be visiting to say 'hello'. This gives Major Clanger an idea!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Sleep - The friends find a fun slide to play on, only to realise that it is in fact a sleeping dinopaw!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: One Step at a Time - A Po lives in a house on a hill where the view is so incredible it takes his breath away. Unfortunately, the journey up to the house takes his breath away too.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: Tasty Trip - After seeing an advertisement for the World Food Festival, Monty wonders if there are ways to explore the world other than travelling.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: Star Yeti - Jeanie wishes she were a famous pop star, but Monty wonders if being famous would really be as great as his sister thinks.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: It Is Absolutely Completely Not Messy - Lola refuses to admit that their shared bedroom is in a terrible mess. When she is accused, she claims her stuff is just 'all spread out'.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: I Am Extremely Magic - Charlie has become a magician. Lola knows this for a fact. He has a new magic set, and he can make coins appear from behind her ears.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Flash Dance - Nelly and Nora use the lighting flashes to play a new game.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Harvest Feast - Nelly and Nora organise a feast to celebrate the good summer on the farm.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep31
programme.desc: Woolly Memories - Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep32
programme.desc: Beach Break - Sarah & Duck are spending a day at the beach, aiming to build some sand animals.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep14
programme.desc: Emily's Winter Party Special - It is wintertime on Sodor and there is going to be a Winter Festival at the Town Square. The Fat Controller tells the engines that he will choose the most helpful engine to be the party engine.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Daddy Robot - Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: Dog Loves Bedtime Baboon - Dog and Pug go on an adventure to help Bedtime Baboon get all the young children around the world to sleep. They have to sprinkle moondust everywhere to help the children go to sleep.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep51
programme.desc: The Fashion Badge - Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep52
programme.desc: The Glasses Badge - When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath and teach him a special song to help him learn how to brush his teeth.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Geo Challenge - The Go Jetters test their knowledge and teamwork in a tricky maze full of trials. But can they escape the labyrinth, beat Glitch's high score and still keep the team together?

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Dinosaur Tails - Ankylosaurus is tired from carrying around his heavy armour and tail all day, the last thing he needs is to get something stuck on it.

programme.title: Andy's Top 5 (S1) Ep2

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep12

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: Hammocks - Captain Sinker hurts her back and orders a comfy bed from Cook and Line. Meanwhile, the Swashbucklers aim to win back all Gem's jewels.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: Shellephone - Cook and Line create a makeshift telephone using two shells and a string of seaweed, and play prank calls on an unsuspecting Captain Sinker.

programme.desc: Eek, An Urchin! / Squid's Defense - SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Present Tense / Any Given Sundae - Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Wait / A Mutt Above - Lori takes a waitressing job at Dad's restaurant, but it turns out that serving is harder than she anticipated. // Spurred on by a classmate's mocking about Charles, Lana decides to train him to compete in a local dog show.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep111
programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Señor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep64
programme.desc: Good Neighbors - Squidward's lazy Sunday is constantly interrupted by Spongebob and Patrick's Good Neighbor Club activities.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep65
programme.desc: Selling Out / Funny Pants - Mr. Krabs sells the Krusty Krab to a conglomerate and explores the joys of retirement. // Squidward tricks his neighbor into believing that Spongebob has a laugh-related illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep181
programme.desc: License to Milkshake - SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Alien Zoo - When Danger Force becomes the newest exhibit at an Alien Zoo, Miles must find a way to break them out before they become alien dinner.

programme.title: Henry Danger S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Henry the Man-Beast - Henry’s got a big date, but things don't go quite as planned after he's accidentally exposed to a strange device in the Man Cave.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Lost & Found Part 1 - Exiled on a mining colony outside Federation space, a group of lawless teens discover a derelict Starfleet ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lost and Found Part 2 - Dal must gather an unlikely crew for their newfound ship if they are going to escape Tars Lamora, but The Diviner and his daughter Gwyn have other plans.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep125
programme.desc: Pineapple Fever / Chum Caverns - Squidward gets stuck indoors with SpongeBob and Patrick during a storm. // Plankton creates an underground restaurant that threatens to put the Krusty Krab out of business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep126
programme.desc: The Clash of Triton - King Neptune is celebrating his birthday at the Krusty Krab, and SpongeBob wants to make sure all his friends and family are there, including his son, Triton.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep103
programme.desc: POSTBOT 3000 / Boom Goes the Cloud - Angus agrees to compete against Mayor Peeve's new POSTBOT in a 'mail-off' to save the Middlemost Post. // Parker's anxiety escalates when the cloud appears to be the source of loud nightly thundering plaguing the town.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep104
programme.desc: I Named It Whiskers / How Angus Got His Groove Back - After one of Lily's inventions goes haywire, she enlists Parker's help to get it back under control. // Angus loses his lucky beanie, which causes him to revert back to being a child.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Snack Pact / The Horror-Scope - The family discovers an amazing tamale cart and tries to keep it a secret from Abuela. // Ronnie Anne doesn't believe in an astrological prediction that 'love will find her,' until it seems to come true.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Snack Pact - The family discovers an amazing tamale cart and tries to keep it a secret from Abuela.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk - Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S06 Ep613
programme.desc: 9 Lives / Dread 'n' Breakfast - When Catman tells Timmy that he's used up 8 of his 9 cat lives saving Dimmsdale from crime, Timmy helps Catman find a 'safer' job where he can still help people. // Mom turns the house into a bed and breakfast!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S09 Ep921
programme.desc: School of Crock - Poof is going through 'pooferty' and is finally learning to speak! Meanwhile, Mr. Crocker becomes a teacher at the Fairy Academy and tries to steal all the students' magic!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S09 Ep923
programme.desc: The Past and the Furious - Cosmo and Wanda take Timmy on a trip back in time to meet some of their past Godkids. But things take a turn for the worst when Timmy interacts with the past and alters the future!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep237
programme.desc: Goons on the Moon - Sandy takes her "Science Scout" troop on a trip to the moon. In space, no one can hear you NYAH-NYAH-NYAH-NYAH!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone / The Night Patty - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back. // SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Granny Awards / Sick Day - Dave is thrilled when he thinks he's nominated for a Grammy, but it's actually an award for aging musicians. // Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep412
programme.desc: The Exchange Student / Crystal Ball Birthday - When an exchange student comes to visit, he tells a scary story that make the chipmunks think Dave is in danger. // Annie and Amber offer to plan Brittany's birthday party, pitting her against Jeanette and Eleanor in the process.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Lost in the Frost / An Eggcellent Adventure - Corn and Peg find a lost plushie doll on a ski trip and pledge to return it to its rightful owner. // After a flock of newborn ducklings wander away from their nest, it's up to Corn and Peg to bring them back safe and sound.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Beached Day / Welcome Baby Marissa - Corn and Peg bring Ferris to the beach, vowing to give him 'the best beach day ever!' // After the arrival of her baby sister, Clarissa feels like no one cares about her. Corn and Peg make it their mission to show Clarissa how special she is.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Insane in the Crane Game / Buhdeuce Goes Berserks - SwaySway and Buhdeuce become obsessed with winning a toy out of the new crane game that's been installed at Pumpers. // When Buhdeuce gets a bad haircut, he goes berserks, and now SwaySway has to calm his buddy down before he gets busted by Rambamboo

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Blood, Sweat & Fears - As the quest to the witch's castle begins, the group must pass through the ominous Swamp of Fears, where one's worst terrors are unleashed. Brendar is surprised to come face to face with a deepseeded anxiety that will test her leadership in new ways.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Dorg and the Pony Prance / Dorg and the Normhole - When Dorg and his sister go head-to-head a contest and a spell goes awry, he must choose - win a trophy or save his sister. // RD acts as the town mascot in exchange for the legendary Mall Pass, which grants VIP treatment at every store in the mall!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Merry Mythmas - When Santa Paws takes the year off, Felicity is chosen to replace him and deliver the Mythmas presents to all of Mythlandia. Rudy teams up with Timmy the Kraken to try and ruin Mythmas so it's up to Felicity and her friends to save the day.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep119
programme.desc: A Tail of Two Slithers - Craig meets his long-lost brother, Ronnie Slithers, who uses devious methods to try and turn the dudes against one another.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Release the Hound / Cube is the Loneliest Number - Bernie pleads with Ollie and Cleo to let him keep a gross doglike monster they are intending to pack. // When Ashlor traps Ollie, Bernie, Cleo and Wowski, Ollie figures out how to escape to the Dark Cube.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Brain Drain / Fanboyfriend - Following a particularly awesome crash landing, Fanboy's brain pops out of his head and he loses his memory. // Fanboy is practicing to be a superhero and "saves" damsel in distress, Lupe.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Iron Mutt / The Wrong Stuff - Keswick builds a large body suit for Dudley to make Dudley Petropolis's most popular hero. But the fame gets to his head. // Kitty's old partner, Jack Rabbit, tries to recruit Kitty to work for him at his new secret agency.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep504
programme.desc: The Sirenix Book - The Winx use Tecna's tech-savvy skills to find the Sirenix Book, but the Trix interfere with the Winx' search. When Tritannus learns of the Winx' mission to achieve Sirenix, he too, seeks to obtain it.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep505
programme.desc: The Lilo - The Winx and Trix race to find the Lilo, a magic plant, which will bloom for the first time in centuries. When the people of Gardenia stand up for the Winx, the Winx are able to defeat the Trix and the Lilo blooms.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep126
programme.desc: End Game - Splinter and the Turtles must prevent Baron Draxum from getting the final piece of the Dark Armor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep148
programme.desc: The Masterpiece / Whelk Attack - Squidward sculpts a statue of Mr. Krabs for The Krusty Krab. // Giant sea whelks terrorize the folks of Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Between a Rope and A Hard Place - Coach Dobkins kicks Cheesy and Theodore off the track team for being slow, but Theodore is determined to compete.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep415
programme.desc: World Day - To celebrate 'World Day' and win a trip, the Chipmunks each get a country to represent for a school presentation.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Allergic Reaction - While training for a TV baking competition with Eleanor, Theodore develops an allergy to an unknown ingredient.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep115
programme.desc: I Know What You Did Last Mail Off - Parker learns that the mail Drone the cloud accidentally destroyed has come back for revenge. Parker, Lily, and Mayor Peeve team up to stop the zombie mail Drone once and for all.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep116

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: AFLW Ep22
programme.desc: A Sunday tripleheader of AFLW begins with the Collingwood Magpies hosting the Adelaide Crows in Round 4 at Victoria Park. Collingwood sit second on the ladder with three straight wins while the Crows sit 8th with two wins.

programme.title: AFLW Ep23
programme.desc: Essendon host Richmond in Round 4 of the AFLW. The Bombers have had the most successful start out of the four debut clubs, winning two of their first three AFLW matches. The Tigers have one win in Season 7 so far.

programme.title: AFLW Ep24
programme.desc: Round 4 of the AFLW concludes with a blockbuster clash between 1st and 3rd on the ladder. The top of the table Brisbane Lions travel to Casey Fields to face the Melbourne Demons, with both teams undefeated so far.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep76
programme.desc: Gemma Veness presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep23

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Song
programme.desc: Prelims - As two of the top fighters in the UFC’s most stacked weight class, Cory Sandhagen and Song Yadong haveproven worthy of their elite status, but on September 18, only one of these bantamweights will emergevictorious in the pivotal five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of stirringknockout wins over Marlon Moraes and Frankie Edgar that skyrocketed him into the 135-pound title picture,Sandhagen is determined to get another shot at the belt, and the first order of business is beating China’sSong, an explosive force who has already dfeated the likes of Moraes, Marlon Vera and Julio Arce.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Song
programme.desc: Main Event - As two of the top fighters in the UFC’s most stacked weight class, Cory Sandhagen and Song Yadong haveproven worthy of their elite status, but on September 18, only one of these bantamweights will emergevictorious in the pivotal five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas.
